top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.

Adding to this, if presenting, practice, practice, practice until you can go through it (even with notes) without stumbling.  Then record yourself, and watch through it.  It's painful to do this, but I cannot tell you how much it helps!

Love this tip! Also opening your speech with a joke is a great way to defuse tension and get the crowd in a positive mood! Although it’s difficult to present a joke while nervous so its a bit of a double edged sword. Great LPT!
